flawed_nl_solution:
He has 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 black socks
So he has 20+10=<<20+10=35>>35 black and red socks
So he has 35*2=<<35*2=70>>70 white socks
So he has 70+35=<<70+35=105>>105 total socks
#### 105

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 35. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
